attributes.action: Cancel proposals to photograph peoples homes for council tax revaluation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cancel the proposals to allow officials to enter private property in order to photograph or otherwise record details of that property in order to increase council taxes.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/revaluation/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
